name: Petroleum
Relationship: Complementary: SEPIA.Compare: CARBO; GRAPH.; SULPH.; PHOS.Antidotes: NUX; COCCUL.

Heart: Fainting, with ebullitions, heat, and palpitation
Eyes: Dim sight; far-sighted; cannot read fine print without glasses; blennorrhoea of lachrymal sac; MARGINAL BLEPHARITIS
Skin around eyes dry and scurfy
Fever: Flushes of heat, particularly of the face and head; worse at night
Stomach: Gastralgia when stomach is empty; relieved by constant eating
Must rise at night and eat
Strong aversion to fat food, meat; worse, eating cabbage
NAUSEA, with accumulation of water in mouth
Modalities: Better: warm air; lying with head high; dry weather
Worse: before and during a thunderstorm
Mind: Irritable, easily offended, vexed at everything
Thinks he is double, or someone else lying alongside
FEELS THAT DEATH IS NEAR, AND MUST HURRY TO SETTLE AFFAIRS
Back: Pain in nape of neck, stiff and painful
Face: Dry; feels constricted, as if covered with albumin
Respiratory: Dry cough and oppression of chest at night
Oppression of chest; worse, cold air
Dry cough at night, coming deep from chest
Female: Itching and mealy coating of nipple
Nose: NOSTRILS ULCERATED, CRACKED, BURN; tip of nose itches
Ozaena, with scabs and mucopurulent discharge
Head: Sensitive, AS OF A COLD BREEZE BLOWING ON IT
Use thirtieth
MOIST ERUPTION ON SCALP; worse, back and ears
Headache, must hold temples to relieve; provoked by shaking while coughing
Scalp sore to touch, followed by numbness
Feels numb, as if made of wood; OCCIPUT HEAVY, AS OF LEAD
VERTIGO ON RISING, felt in occiput, as if intoxicated, or like sea-sickness
Skin: SKIN DRY, CONSTRICTED, VERY SENSITIVE, ROUGH AND CRACKED, LEATHERY
THICK, GREENISH CRUSTS, BURNING AND ITCHING; REDNESS, RAW; CRACKS BLEED EASILY
Abdomen: DIARRHOEA ONLY IN THE DAYTIME; watery, gushing and ITCHING OF ANUS
After cabbage; with empty feeling of stomach
Extremities: TIPS OF FINGERS ROUGH, CRACKED, FISSURED EVERY WINTER
Ears: Eczema, intertrigo, etc., in and behind ears, with intense itching
Dry catarrh, with deafness and noises
Noise unbearable, especially from several people talking together

details: Strumous diathesis, especially the dark type, who suffer from catarrhal conditions of the mucous membranes, gastric acidity and cutaneous eruptions.Very marked skin symptoms, acting on sweat and oil glands. Ailments are worse during the winter season. Ailments from riding in cars, carriages, or ships; lingering gastric and lung troubles; chronic diarrhoea. LONG-LASTING COMPLAINTS follow mental states - fright, vexation, etc. Chlorosis in young girls with or without ulceration of the stomach.
dosage: Third to thirtieth and higher potencies. Material doses often better.
